FilterThrough (eluting).en: Filter contents of {from_vessel} through {through_cartridge} into {to_vessel}, eluting with {eluting_repeats} x {eluting_volume} of {eluting_solvent}.
FilterThrough (eluting).zh: 过滤{from_vessel}中的滤液经{through_cartridge}进入{to_vessel}, 用{eluting_solvent}{eluting_repeats}x{eluting_volume} 进行洗脱.
FilterThrough (eluting).ru: Отфильтровать содержимое {from_vessel} в {to_vessel} через {through_cartridge}, промыв {eluting_solvent} ({eluting_repeats} раза по {eluting_volume}).
